mapper.select: SELECT PW password , NM name , TL tel , EML email , SALT salt , PIC_NM profileFilename , PIC_ORGNM profileOriginFilename , ATHRTY authority , LTST_LGN latestLogin , LGN_FL_CNT loginFailCount , LTST_PW_CHNG latestPasswordChange , RGST_DT registDate FROM MM WHERE EML = #{email} AND PW = #{password}

SELECT NM name , TL tel , EML email , SALT salt , PIC_NM profileFilename , PIC_ORGNM profileOriginFilename , ATHRTY authority , LTST_LGN latestLogin , LGN_FL_CNT loginFailCount , LTST_PW_CHNG latestPasswordChange , RGST_DT registDate FROM MM WHERE EML = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MM WHERE EML = #{email} AND LTST_LGN + 365 < SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MM WHERE EML = #{email} AND LTST_PW_CHNG + 90 < SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MM WHERE EML = #{email} AND LGN_FL_CNT > 5 AND LTST_LGN + 1/24 > SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MM WHERE EML = #{email} AND RGST_DT = NULL
SELECT AUTH_URL authUrl , EML email , RGST_DT registDate FROM EML_AUTH WHERE AUTH_URL = #{authUrl} AND RGST_DT + 1/24 > SYSDATE
